parameters.name: prompt

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.description: The prompt to send to the model. Do not use if using messages.

parameters.description: The prompt to send to the model. Do not use if using messages.

parameters.name: messages

param_schema.title: Messages
param_schema.description: A JSON string representing a list of messages. For example: [{"role": "user", "content": "Hello, how are you?"}]. If provided, prompt and system_prompt are ignored.

parameters.description: A JSON string representing a list of messages. For example: [{"role": "user", "content": "Hello, how are you?"}]. If provided, prompt and system_prompt are ignored.

parameters.name: image_input

param_schema.title: Image Input
param_schema.description: List of images to send to the model

parameters.description: List of images to send to the model

parameters.name: system_prompt

param_schema.title: System Prompt
param_schema.description: System prompt to set the assistant's behavior

parameters.description: System prompt to set the assistant's behavior

parameters.name: reasoning_effort

param_schema.description: Constrains effort on reasoning for reasoning models. Currently supported values are low, medium, and high. Reducing reasoning effort can result in faster responses and fewer tokens used on reasoning in a response.

parameters.description: Constrains effort on reasoning for reasoning models. Currently supported values are low, medium, and high. Reducing reasoning effort can result in faster responses and fewer tokens used on reasoning in a response.

parameters.name: max_completion_tokens

param_schema.title: Max Completion Tokens
param_schema.description: Maximum number of completion tokens to generate

parameters.description: Maximum number of completion tokens to generate
